contexts.context: I was interested to see <mark>your</mark> article upon Santayana and the Japanese in the Neue...

...any other book or article upon Vienna whether from <mark>your</mark> own pen or not. I should be grateful...

...to translate Tristan for the Dial. It was <mark>your</mark> son who first called my attention to this story...
